page.title: 18 FOLKESTONE:TRAFFIC ANALYSIS
page.content:
Please see previous page for survey results.
CONCLUSIONS: 1 The flow of traffic is heavier in the afternoon. 2 Most traffic heads towards Dover. 3 There is little traffic into Folkestone. 4 There are more lorries than coaches. 5 Most coaches head for Dover. 6 Primary users: British 7 Secondary users: French 8 Tertiary users: Spanish
Note: At the time of the survey (June 1985) the M20 stops at Folkestone, leaving only the A20 as the main route to Dover. A section of the M20 also remains to be built between Maidstone and Ashford.
